name: By The Numbers 3 Online Trivia | 0-10 | 10 Questions

questions.text: How old is Huck Finn in Mark Twain's novel of the same name?
How many episodes did the original TV show 'Mission Impossible' have (1966-1973)?
Major League Baseball- what is the distance in feet between the bases?
In lacrosse, teams play on the field with one goal keeper, three midfielders, three attackers, and how many defenders?
There are always 366 dimples on a golf ball.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Most golf balls have between 300-450 dimples but this varies from brand to brand so the commonly held belief that it was 366 no longer applies.

questions.text: In the novel 'Gone With The Wind', how many husbands does Scarlett O'Hara have?
questions.explanation:
3.

	Scarlett marries Charles Hamilton, Frank Kennedy, and Rhett Butler.

questions.text: Bluebeard's last wife, Fatima, was his third wife.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Fatima was Bluebeard's seventh wife.

questions.text: How many years does the Bible tell us Methuselah lived?
Did Brigham Young have exactly 30 wives?
questions.explanation:
No.

	He had more than 50 wives.

questions.text: How many wives did King Henry the VIII of England have?
